buildings.name: Nexus
buildings.description: The nerve centre of the industrial complex that must be built to enable all other construction.

buildings.name: Engineering Workshop
buildings.description: Provides the infrastructure of construct basic structure types.

buildings.name: Quantum Fabricant
buildings.description: Provides the infrastructure required to construct advanced science and resource related structures.

buildings.name: Power Station
buildings.description: Provides power to structures to ensure they operate with increased efficiency.

buildings.name: Sediment Excavator
buildings.description: Excavates sediment from Outcrops and mechanically separates it into pure Carbon.

buildings.name: Mine
buildings.description: Extracts crystals from a Crystal Deposit and smelts them into pure Silicon.

buildings.name: Hydrogen Pump
buildings.description: Pumps water from Lakes and converts it to liquid Hydrogen.

buildings.name: Crypton Gate
buildings.description: Intercepts spontaneous vacuum fluctuations in Crypton Rifts to capture Cryptons.

buildings.name: Hyperion Extractor
buildings.description: Stimulates the permeability of Hyperion Reservoirs to draw out Hyperions.

buildings.name: Solon Dredge
buildings.description: Uses high-energy radiation to excite Solon Trenches into releasing pure Solons.

buildings.name: Sequestrian Plant
buildings.description: Passively converts CO2 in the atmosphere to Carbon and converts other Elements in to Carbon.

buildings.name: Photodisintegration Plant
buildings.description: Passively converts oxygen in the atmosphere to Silicon and converts other Elements into Silicon.

buildings.name: Condenser Plant
buildings.description: Passively converts water in the atmosphere to Hydrogen and converts other Elements in to Hydrogen.

buildings.name: L-Crypton Collider
buildings.description: Passively converts trace Ethereum in the material plane to Cryptons and converts other resources to Crypton.

buildings.name: Hyperion Lathe
buildings.description: Passively converts trace Ethereum in the material plane to Hyperions and converts other resources to Hyperion.

buildings.name: Anti-Solon Inverter
buildings.description: Passively converts trace Ethereum in the material plane to Solons and converts other resources to Solon.

buildings.name: Carbon Matter Silo
buildings.description: Stores aggregated Carbon nanorods for later use.

buildings.name: Silicon Matter Silo
buildings.description: Stores pure metallic Silicon for later use.

buildings.name: Hydrogen Matter Silo
buildings.description: Safely stores liquid Hydrogen for later use.

buildings.name: Crypton Containment Unit
buildings.description: Stores stable Cryptons for later use.

buildings.name: Hyperion Containment Unit
buildings.description: Stores stable Hyperions for later use.

buildings.name: Solon Containment Unit
buildings.description: Stores stable Solons for later use.

buildings.name: Materials Lab
buildings.description: Provides the requisite facilities to research Illuvial Biodata, Blueprints, and exotic materials found on Illuvium.

buildings.name: Zero Point Transducer
buildings.description: Creates a singularity capable of teleporting matter across large distances.

buildings.name: Singularity Scanner
buildings.description: Scans Illuvials in the surrounding area and records their Biodata.

buildings.name: Data Bank
buildings.description: Stores uncompressed data such as Illuvial Biodata and Blueprints, and improves research efficiency.

buildings.name: Holographic Statue
buildings.description: Displays a 3D Hologram of your scanned Illuvial Biodata.

buildings.name: Marketplace
buildings.description: Creates an uplink to the Marketplace, allowing the purchase and sale of Resources.
